attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to call on Post Office Ltd not to close Buckpool Post Office in Moray.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Buckpool Post Office is a Community post office in Buckpool and is under threat of closure by Post Office Ltd. If the post office closes, we will lose a local amenity and possibly our local shop and will have to drive or use public transport to go to the main one in Buckie. Most local buses are not adapted to take the elderly or disabled to and from Buckie and are also not regular enough.Please sign our petition and help us to stop Post Office Ltd from ripping the heart out of our local community.
